Alert.Name: STD_ALERT_UNSUPPORTED_PLATFORM
Alert.Title: Unsupported Platform
Alert.AlertMessage: This application requires <list of supported platforms>.

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
-- This removes the Wizard Window. 
-- Add your code before or after or amend as necessary
if show_alert('CONFIRM_CANCEL') = ALERT_BUTTON1 then
--clean up for next time
 go_block('EMP');
 clear_block(no_commit);
 go_item('EMP.ENAME');
 synchronize;

 Wizard.Wizard_Finish;
 go_block('NAVIGATOR');
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
begin
 if :system.record_status = 'INSERT' or
 :system.record_status = 'CHANGED' then
 post;
 end if;

--clean up ready for next time
 go_block('EMP');
 clear_block(no_commit);
 go_item('EMP.ENAME');
 synchronize;

 Wizard.Wizard_Finish;

 refresh_trees;
 navigator.display_tree;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare 
 new_page number default Wizard.Page_Number-1;
begin
--Navigate to the right place
 if new_page = 2 then
 go_item('EMP.ENAME');
 elsif new_page = 3 then
 go_item('EMP.HIREDATE');
 elsif new_page = 4 then
 go_item('EMP.DEPTNO');
 else
 go_item('WIZ_BAR.NEXT');
 end if;

-- Set the page number to previous page and display it
 Wizard.Wizard_Show(new_page);

-- The name of the new canvas is in package variable
-- Wizard.PageName

end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare 
 new_page number default Wizard.Page_Number+1;
begin
--Navigate to the right place
 if new_page = 2 then
 go_item('EMP.ENAME');
 elsif new_page = 3 then
 go_item('EMP.HIREDATE');
 elsif new_page = 4 then
 go_item('EMP.DEPTNO');
 else
 go_item('WIZ_BAR.NEXT');
 end if;

-- Set the page number to previous page and display it
 Wizard.Wizard_Show(new_page);

-- The name of the new canvas is in package variable
-- Wizard.PageName

end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-CLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :system.mouse_button_pressed = '1' and :system.record_status <> 'NEW' then
 pick_list.set_picklist_selection(pick_list.list_in, 
 to_number(:system.mouse_record),
 :system.mouse_button_shift_state);
 pick_list.display_picklist(pick_list.list_in);
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-CLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :system.mouse_button_pressed = '1' and :system.record_status <> 'NEW' then
 pick_list.set_picklist_selection(pick_list.list_out, 
 to_number(:system.mouse_record),
 :system.mouse_button_shift_state);
 pick_list.display_picklist(pick_list.list_out);
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 moveto number;
 row_count number;
begin
 pick_list.picklist_element_move(pick_list.list_out, pick_list.list_in, pick_list.picklist_selected);
 pick_list.display_picklist(pick_list.list_in);
 pick_list.display_picklist(pick_list.list_out);

 row_count := pick_list.get_picklist_element_count(pick_list.list_in);
 if row_count > 0 then
 moveto := pick_list.get_picklist_selection(pick_list.list_in, 1);
 go_block(pick_list.list_in);
 go_record(moveto);
 end if;

 row_count := pick_list.get_picklist_element_count(pick_list.list_out);
 if row_count > 0 then
 moveto := pick_list.get_picklist_selection(pick_list.list_out, 1);
 go_block(pick_list.list_out);
 go_record(moveto);
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
pick_list.picklist_element_move(pick_list.list_out, pick_list.list_in, pick_list.picklist_all);
pick_list.display_picklist(pick_list.list_out);
pick_list.display_picklist(pick_list.list_in);

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
pick_list.picklist_element_move(pick_list.list_in, pick_list.list_out, pick_list.picklist_all);
pick_list.display_picklist(pick_list.list_in);
pick_list.display_picklist(pick_list.list_out);

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare
 moveto number;
 row_count number;
begin
 pick_list.picklist_element_move(pick_list.list_in, pick_list.list_out, pick_list.picklist_selected);
 pick_list.display_picklist(pick_list.list_in);
 pick_list.display_picklist(pick_list.list_out);

 row_count := pick_list.get_picklist_element_count(pick_list.list_in);
 if row_count > 0 then
 moveto := pick_list.get_picklist_selection(pick_list.list_in, 1);
 go_block(pick_list.list_in);
 go_record(moveto);
 end if;

 row_count := pick_list.get_picklist_element_count(pick_list.list_out);
 if row_count > 0 then
 moveto := pick_list.get_picklist_selection(pick_list.list_out, 1);
 go_block(pick_list.list_out);
 go_record(moveto);
 end if;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-DOUBLECLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
declare 
 line_num number;

begin
 navigator.invert_state(navigator.get_tree_name, navigator.To_Index(:system.mouse_record));
-- re-display the current tree
 navigator.display_tree;
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-NEW-RECORD-INSTANCE
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 context_index number;
 tree varchar2(30);
BEGIN
--Avoid unnecessary work when Display_Tree is scrolling
--through the records and causing this fire
 if navigator.get_tree_name is null then
 return;
 end if;

--Always do this
 clear_list('NAVIGATOR_CONTROL.NAV_CONTEXT');

--Only 1 NEW record in block implies block is empty
--So hide it completely to prevent odd visual effects
 if :system.block_status = 'NEW' then
 go_block('NAVIGATOR_CONTROL');
 hide_view('NAVIGATOR_TREE');
 else
 show_view('NAVIGATOR_TREE');
 if :system.record_status = 'NEW' then 
 previous_record;
 end if;
-- Fill in the context
 tree := navigator.get_tree_name;
 context_index := navigator.To_Index(:system.cursor_record);
 loop 
 exit when context_index < 1;

 add_list_element('NAVIGATOR_CONTROL.NAV_CONTEXT', 1,
 lpad(' ', 
 (navigator.get_Tree_Element_depth(tree, context_index)-1)*4) ||
 navigator.get_Tree_Element_Label(tree, context_index),
 navigator.get_Tree_Element_Value(tree, context_index));

 context_index := navigator.Get_Tree_Element_Parent(tree, context_index);
 end loop;

 :navigator_control.nav_context := navigator.get_Tree_Element_value
 (tree,
 navigator.To_Index(:system.cursor_record));

 end if;

--Add custom code here only
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-MOUSE-CLICK
Trigger.TriggerText:
if :system.mouse_button_pressed = '1' then
 if :navigator_control.nav_multiselect = 1 then
 navigator.set_tree_selection(navigator.get_tree_name, 
 navigator.to_index(:system.mouse_record),
 :system.mouse_button_shift_state);
 navigator.display_tree;
 end if;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-LIST-CHANGED
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Don't hang when NULL element selected
 if :navigator_control.nav_context is NULL then
 raise Form_trigger_Failure;
 end if;
 

--Navigate to the selected element
 go_block('NAVIGATOR');
 loop
 exit when :navigator_control.nav_context =
 navigator.Get_Tree_Element_Value(navigator.get_tree_name, 
 navigator.To_Index(:system.cursor_record));
 previous_record;
 end loop;

--Mark just this row as selected
 navigator.Set_Tree_Selection(navigator.get_tree_name, 
 navigator.to_index(:system.cursor_record),
 '');

 navigator.display_tree;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 tree varchar2(30);
 found number default 0;
 context_index number;

BEGIN
 tree := navigator.get_tree_name; 
 go_block('NAVIGATOR');

 for i in navigator.To_Index(:system.cursor_record)+1 
 .. navigator.get_tree_element_count(tree) loop
 if :navigator_control.Nav_Find = 
 substr(navigator.Get_Tree_element_label(tree, i), 1, length(:navigator_control.Nav_Find)) then
-- found a match...
-- Expand all the parent nodes to ensure this one visible
 context_index := i;
 loop 
 context_index := navigator.Get_Tree_Element_Parent(tree, context_index);
 exit when context_index < 1;

 navigator.expand(tree, context_index);
 end loop;

--Mark just this row as selected
 navigator.Set_Tree_Selection(navigator.get_tree_name, i, '');

-- Navigate to this one
-- refresh the display with the expanded nodes
 navigator.display_tree;
-- Found node must be below here somewhere
 while navigator.To_Index(:system.cursor_record) <> i loop
 next_record;
 end loop;
 found := 1;
 exit;
 end if;
 end loop;

 if found = 0 then -- got to end without a match 
 bell;
 end if;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
DECLARE
 tree varchar2(30);
 found number default 0;
 context_index number;

BEGIN
-- This is identical to Search forward except for the limits on the loop
-- and the note marked NOTE!

 tree := navigator.get_tree_name; 
 go_block('NAVIGATOR');

 for i in reverse 1..navigator.To_Index(:system.cursor_record)-1 loop
 if :navigator_control.Nav_Find = 
 substr(navigator.Get_Tree_element_label(tree, i), 1, length(:navigator_control.Nav_Find)) then
-- found a match...
-- Expand all the parent nodes to ensure this one visible
 context_index := i;
 loop 
 context_index := navigator.Get_Tree_Element_Parent(tree, context_index);
 exit when context_index < 1;

 navigator.expand(tree, context_index);
 end loop;

--Mark just this row as selected
 navigator.Set_Tree_Selection(navigator.get_tree_name, i, '');

-- Navigate to this one
-- refresh the display with the expanded nodes
 navigator.display_tree;

-- NOTE! Need to start at the beginning and work down as
-- having expanded parts of the tree ABOVE us, we no longer know where we are!
 first_record;
 while navigator.To_Index(:system.cursor_record) <> i loop
 next_record;
 end loop;
 found := 1;
 exit;
 end if;
 end loop;

 if found = 0 then -- got to end without a match 
 bell;
 end if;
END;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
begin
 refresh_trees;
 navigator.display_tree('EMPS');
end;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText: commit work;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
if show_alert('CONFIRM_REVERT') = alert_button1 then
 clear_form(no_commit);
 refresh_trees;
 navigator.display_tree('emps');
 go_block('NAVIGATOR');
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Refresh the managers list
if populate_group('managers') = 0 then
 populate_list('emp.mgr', 'managers');
end if;

--start the Wizard
if not wizard.wizard_begin('WIZ_EMP0,WIZ_EMP1,WIZ_EMP2,WIZ_EMP3', 
 'Employee Wizard', FALSE) then
 message('Internal error 666');
 go_block('NAVIGATOR');
 wizard.wizard_finish;
end if;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
begin
--Check that this is not a department
 if navigator.get_tree_name = 'DEPTS' and
 navigator.get_tree_element_depth(navigator.get_tree_name, 
 navigator.to_index(:system.cursor_record)) = 1 then
 return;
 end if;

 if show_alert('CONFIRM_FIRE_EMP') = alert_button1 then

--Save the employee number
 :global.emp_to_edit := navigator.get_tree_element_value(
 navigator.get_tree_name,
 navigator.to_index(:system.cursor_record));

--populate the block
 go_block('emp');
 execute_query; 

--Remove the employee record
 delete_record;

--Clean up
 post;
 clear_block(no_commit);

--Redisplay the tree
 refresh_trees;
 navigator.display_tree;
 end if;
end;

Item.Name: EDIT
Item.Hint: Modify the details of an existing employee
Item.Label: Modify

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
--Check that this is not a department
 if navigator.get_tree_name = 'DEPTS' and
 navigator.get_tree_element_depth(navigator.get_tree_name, 
 navigator.to_index(:system.cursor_record)) = 1 then
 return;
 end if;

--Save the employee number
:global.emp_to_edit := navigator.get_tree_element_value(
 navigator.get_tree_name,
 navigator.to_index(:system.cursor_record));

--Refresh the managers list
if populate_group('managers') = 0 then
 populate_list('emp.mgr', 'managers');
end if;

--start the Wizard
if not wizard.wizard_begin('WIZ_EMP0,WIZ_EMP1,WIZ_EMP2,WIZ_EMP3', 
 'Employee Wizard', FALSE) then
 message('Internal error 666');
 go_block('NAVIGATOR');
 wizard.wizard_finish;
end if;

--Skip the intro screen
wizard.Wizard_show(2);

--populate the block
go_block('emp');
execute_query;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
navigator.expand(navigator.get_tree_name, navigator.To_Index(:system.cursor_record));
navigator.display_tree;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
navigator.collapse(navigator.get_tree_name, navigator.To_Index(:system.cursor_record));
navigator.display_tree;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
navigator.expand_all(navigator.get_tree_name, navigator.To_Index(:system.cursor_record));
navigator.display_tree;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
navigator.collapse_all(navigator.get_tree_name, navigator.To_Index(:system.cursor_record));
navigator.display_tree;

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
date_lov.current_lov_date := add_months(date_lov.current_lov_date, 1);
date_lov.display_cal(date_lov.current_lov_date);

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
date_lov.current_lov_date := add_months(date_lov.current_lov_date, 12);
date_lov.display_cal(date_lov.current_lov_date);

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
date_lov.current_lov_date := add_months(date_lov.current_lov_date, -12);
date_lov.display_cal(date_lov.current_lov_date);

Trigger.Name: WHEN-BUTTON-PRESSED
Trigger.TriggerText:
date_lov.current_lov_date := add_months(date_lov.current_lov_date, -1);
date_lov.display_cal(date_lov.current_lov_date);

ProgramUnit.Name: DATE_CHOOSEN
ProgramUnit.ProgramUnitText:
PROCEDURE date_choosen IS
BEGIN
 copy(to_char(date_lov.current_lov_date,'dd-mon-yyyy'), date_lov.date_lov_return_item);
 go_item(date_lov.date_lov_return_item);
 if date_lov.lov_auto_skip = TRUE then
 next_item;
 end if;
END;
